Dr. Kuntal Mandal

Dr. Kuntal Mandal was a post-doctoral fellow from 2012 to 2017 at KAU Jedau Saudi Arabia and IISER-Kolkata. His research interests lie in the development of control strategies for power electronic systems. He is currently an Assistant Professor at NIT Sikkim.

 Email ID: dr.kuntal.mandal@gmail.com

 More information available here





Department of Physical Sciences
